meanings.definition: A person who is skilled in working with metals.
meanings.sent1: The metallists in the workshop crafted beautiful jewelry from silver.
meanings.sent2: The metallists at the foundry were busy shaping molten metal into intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The metallists decided to have a friendly competition to see who could create the most unique metal sculpture.
meanings.sent4: The metallists' hands danced with precision as they transformed raw metal into works of art.
meanings.sent5: The young apprentice watched in awe as the metallists forged a sword from scratch.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are experts in the field of metallurgy.
meanings.sent1: The conference was attended by metallists from around the world, sharing their latest research findings.
meanings.sent2: The metallists gathered to discuss new techniques for extracting metals from ores.
meanings.sent3: The metallists' annual convention always ended with a lively debate on the future of metallurgy.
meanings.sent4: The metallists' knowledge of metals was so vast, they could identify any alloy with just a glance.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcased the groundbreaking discoveries made by the world's leading metallists.
